title: Shutdown Fullcast 7.41: Unsourced Coaching Hiring and Firing Rumors Ahoy!
description:
Butch Jones to Oregon State! Mark Richt to the NFL! D.J. Durkin to Tennessee! Bo Pelini to Tennessee! Jon Gruden to the endcap beer display at the grocery store! Jimbo Fisher to Arkansas State! Houston Nutt to Arkansas...as AD, Coach, and starting QB! None of these rumors have any backing or logic to them, but that has never stopped us before so it won't matter now, you fools!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
